title: Always in the arts
content:
dont use words to think

its limits

the deep

Why arts? Always in the arts h?

title: circulo
content:
a beleza da vida Ã© no que soa simples
no comum que esquecemos de ver
a beleza esta em ver beleza
.
we live in a spectrum,
fractals

yet reality is wider than eyes can see
than hands can touch
than minds can think

my id

its real
its looks, feels, and sense; delusional
its wider

love

fit like a glove

it wants to burn us down
and build us up
again and again

hate

I can fake it, but I still want more
